AttackVector.comments: The attacker connect to application over a network

AttackComplexity.comments: The attack is easy to reproduce and doesn't need specific access conditions

PrivilegesRequired.comments: The attack doesn't need specific privilege

UserInteraction.comments: The attack doesn't neeed an action from an user

Scope.comments: The attack impact only the application

ConfidentialityImpact.comments: This kind of attack is often use to identify an entry point to inject others kind of injection (SQL Union, SQL Or injection). This kind of attack can be use to collect informations about the database product

IntegrityImpact.comments: Often no integrity impact but depends of processing attacked

AvailabilityImpact.comments: Often no availability impact but depends of processing attacked
